mapper.select: select id_ defid, name_ name, deployment_Id_ deploymentId, description_ description from act_re_procdef where deployment_Id_ IN ( SELECT deployment_Id_ FROM act_re_model WHERE key_ = #{actKey} )

SELECT DISTINCT user_name,u.id, (SELECT name FROM sys_organ o WHERE o.id=u.bapid) AS bapName, (SELECT name FROM sys_organ o WHERE o.id=u.baid) AS baName FROM sys_user u, (select user_type,nu.id as nodeUserId,ns.node_type FROM extend_act_nodeuser nu,extend_act_nodeset ns WHERE ns.node_id=nu.node_id AND nu.node_id =#{nodeId}) nodeuser WHERE ( (user_type ='1' AND nodeUserId = u.id) or (user_type = '2' AND u.id IN (SELECT user_id FROM sys_user_role ur WHERE ur.role_id=nodeUserId)) or (user_type='3' AND u.baid = nodeUserId) )
AND user_name LIKE concat('%',#{userName},'%')

SELECT user_name,id, (SELECT name FROM sys_organ o WHERE o.id=u.bapid) AS bapName, (SELECT name FROM sys_organ o WHERE o.id=u.baid) AS baName FROM sys_user u WHERE 1=1
AND user_name LIKE concat('%',#{userName},'%')
